MoonChief.taunt: Come! I shall grant you a swift death.
MoonChief.bf1: Come and face me. Your time has come.
MoonChief.bf2: Fight strong stranger! I will aid you!
MoonChief.bf3: Moon Chief, of the Moon at Midnight tribe.
MoonChief.bf5: Come and join me, Wildman. Use your strength for the tribe.
MoonChief.bf6: I will give you the name Blue Moon, the Warrior General.
MoonChief.bf7: The forest is safe, the tribe shall defend it.
MoonChief.mam1: Who dares to attack our tribe!?
MoonChief.mam4: They dare to attack us!? Do they not fear the Moon at Midnight? They dare to dream they can defeat us!?
MoonChief.rose1: Hear Me! Moon Chief has defeated Red Face in a Duel!
MoonChief.rose2: Now cut down the rest of the scum.
MoonChief.rose3: The matter is settled. Let us proceed.
MoonChief.storm1: Now you face the Moon at Midnight!
MoonChief.storm2: Moon Chief has slain the enemy general
MoonChief.storm3: Push back the rest of them!
MoonChief.mines2: ... What is it you want me to do?
MoonChief.mines3: OK. Then I'll break some rocks.
MoonChief.mines4: Who would dare to loot our mines
MoonChief.mines5: Then let us settle the matter now.
MoonChief.mines7: Now. To Green Village in the east.
MoonChief.plains6: Slaughter the rest of them while they are surprised
MoonChief.plains7: Move forward, quickly, we still have the upper hand
MoonChief.plains8: Slaughter the rest! Don't let them regroup
MoonChief.plains9: Come my warriors, now we charge their main force
MoonChief.plains11: Hah! Dig deep for the next wave!
MoonChief.plains12: I am Moon Chief of Moon at Midnight.
MoonChief.plains13: We have defeated the Whiteleaf Army!
MoonChief.green2: Night Train has sent me here for you. Come. Fly with our tribe, Moon at Midnight.
MoonChief.green3: Go to Moon at Midnight. I will hold them!
MoonChief.green4: I am the mighty Moon Chief! I will hold them!
MoonChief.green6: A true warrior. Let us battle to the bitter end.
MoonChief.green8: Do you have a name for him?

Wildman.bf2: What is your name? I am Wildman of the Blue Forest.
Wildman.bf3: The mighty Moon Chief himself! I am honoured.
Wildman.bf4: Haha! I train hard every day.
Wildman.bf5: Ha! How can I... I am the defender of this forst.
Wildman.bf6: Hahaha! You are an interesting one indeed!

BlueMoon.mam1: Amazing. They are as beautiful as the rumours say.
BlueMoon.plains1: This place is far from the forest
BlueMoon.plains7: What is the plan to take the Architect?

NightTrain.mines2: You finally got to Red Face, that filthy traitor.
NightTrain.mines5: Blue silica is a mineral we use in construction. It has diverse uses and it's super valuable. It's not rare by any means, but it's so versatile.
NightTrain.mines6: Because it has so many uses, all the tribes covet it. Thus the prices have skyrocketed ever since someone discovered how to process it!
NightTrain.mines7: Help me collect the silica! Break the rocks, the purple-ish ones.
NightTrain.mines8: Gather up the small blue stones tha drop out and hand them to me. I'll cart it back to Moon at Midnight and we'll ask Harvest Moon about processing the lot.
NightTrain.mines9: Great! That's enough for now, MC. Let's go see Harvest Moon.
NightTrain.mines10: Hah! I was worried for nothing, it's all clear!
NightTrain.mines11: Come on MC! We need more silica. Let's work.
NightTrain.mines12: I'll run it to Storm. Keep it coming!
NightTrain.mines13: We'll need more. We'll need alot more!
NightTrain.mines14: Come to Storm, I'll hire some villagers.
NightTrain.storm1: All of that comes later! We've found some blue silica deposits just passed the village!
NightTrain.storm2: Haha! Right? Tell MC how great this is.
NightTrain.storm4: The Architect! We're counting on you MC!
NightTrain.storm5: No time to rest MC! We need to secure The Mines!
NightTrain.green1: Architect. Welcome to Moon at Midnight!

Lunar.green4: Finally. I am free of Whiteleaf.
Lunar.green5: I am honoured to fly with the tribe!
Lunar.green6: I am Lunar the Architect of Moon at Midnight!

Braver.mam1: Whiteleaf have sent an army! They are destroying Storm!

Zoll.storm1: Sir, we have news on Whiteleaf. Please come to Rose Forest.
Zoll.storm2: Sir! The Whiteleaf tribe are camped in The Plains preparing an attack.
Zoll.storm3: My unit are ready to ambush them. Please lead us!.

Madogu.plains1: You should have called us Moon Chief! We came here to aid you!

HarvestMoon.storm1: Bravo Moon Chief, I came to see the good news myself.
HarvestMoon.storm3: I know a man who used to refine this in Green Village to the east... The Architect.

RabidBandit.boss2: Murderous dogs! You slaughtered them all!
RabidBandit.boss3: Where were you when the Rays of Gold massacred us!
RabidBandit.boss4: Where were you when we were slain!
RabidBandit.boss5: What choice did we have! We had to eat!
RabidBandit.boss6: Curse you! Heartless dogs! Curse you both!
RabidBandit.boss7: Come on my brethren! Kill them!

RedFace.mam1: Ah.. Chief. I thought you would be gone for longer!
RedFace.retreat: Hah. I guess I better retreat
RedFace.rose1: Hahaha. You think you can kill me here! This is MY forest!
RedFace.rose2: Go, go! Crimson Bandits! Stop them!
RedFace.rose4: Well well.. Fine. I guess it's round 2, Chief!

GreenSword.green1: Moon Chief. I am Green Sword of Green Village.

Boss.TallAsh: Why are you here!? Moon Chief the bastard warrior!
Boss.FallingWillow: Hah! So you caught us off guard!
Boss.GreenMeadow1: What a joke. Who knew this backwater hovel had any actual warriors!
Boss.GreenMeadow2: Country bumpkin. You are no one! From this unknown jut in the middle of nowhere!
Boss.GreenMeadow3: Powerful indeed. You have defeated me bumpkin. Maybe you will be strong enough to see the real world.

Soldier.traitor: Deserter! Deserter! Traitor! Kill them all!
